title: High Volume of Support Requests
body:
I sent a ticket regarding me getting (most likely) wrongfully banned by the auto-feedback banning on Monday, it is now Thursday afternoon without a single response about my ticket. Just how long should I have to wait during a "high volume of support requests" to get something like this looked at? I really feel like there's some injustice at hand here (and all of my friends had agreed that I was banned for an absolutely absurd reason and seemingly misunderstood reason.) I would really appreciate it if this could get looked at, as I play for a school team, and its hard to play without an account to play on.

I can provide the "reason," or chat log, for why I was banned, and my support ticket ID if necessary.

Thank you so much

replies.body: Our PB team has a higher volume right now, but we will definitely get back to you as soon as we can.  Toss me your ticket number, and I'd be happy to check on the status for you.

My ticket number is #32101366, thank you so much :) this is really kind of frustrating for me, especially if I end up losing my season rewards for some mistake on the auto-flagger

I appreciate this a lot

Don't worry, if an unintended issue caused you to not receive rewards then we would correct that.  Your ticket was successfully received and fielded to the correct team.  Hand tight and we'll reply back as soon as we can!

Thanks for the confirmation, having your season rewards in limbo can make you pretty anxious, especially when its your first season getting diamond
 {{sticker:sg-janna}}
